body.p: The issues that arise with respect to employee share purchase plans are:

li.p: are these plans somehow so different from other employee share plans that a different accounting treatment is appropriate?

even if the answer to the above question is ‘no’, are there circumstances, such as when the discount is very small, when it is appropriate to exempt employee share purchase plans from an accounting standard on share‑based payment?
